name: Turf Rally
description:
Cats, rallies and total war!

Need to challenge your friends in a quick and intense pong rally? Turf Rally brings it back with a few extra twists to make it more challenging!

→ Turf-based rallies across 9 different fields.

→ 2-player PVP or Singleplayer modes.

→ Easy to understand, multiple control options ranging from shared keyboard, to shared controller or 2 separate controllers.

→ Varied powerups to turn the tide of the rally.

→ The ball gradually increases in speed if the rally takes too long.

→ Each field has its own set of obstacles.

→ Kitty cuteness and fancy colours!

Players start in the middle of 9 fields, each goal scored lets you move onto the next one! Score on all of them to win! But beware, if your opponent scores, you'll be back to the previous field! To keep it intense, each field comes with its obstacles, and powerups will join the fun!

Need something to gain the upper hand? Powerups can appear at random and turn the tide of the rally!

Bomb → Makes the ball unstable. Something could happen if a player touches it!

Lightning → Send the ball back twice as fast!

Shield → Makes it easier to defend your goal!

Smoke → As the name implies... it gets in the way.

Fire → A fire ball surely could smash through obstacles!

The fields won't be the same, with each field having its own set of obstacles! Moving or static, the obstacles you encounter will make your ball bounce in other directions. So be mindful of their presence!

Why have boring paddles, when you can have cats fighting over a yarn ball!

Enjoy some extra kitty cuteness as you challenge your friends in this intense rally action!

Programming done by Elliott Lefebvre

Character and ball art drawn by Laura Bettini

Developed while interning at Nerial
